Metadata.Title: Users And Administrators Do Not Share Accounts
Metadata.DirectLink: Users And Administrators Do Not Share Accounts
Metadata.Priority: J.D. Meier, Alex Mackman, Michael Dunner, Srinath Vasireddy, Ray Escamilla and Anandha Murukan

Content.Data:
What to Check For

Check to ensure that no shared accounts are created for use by multiple individuals. Make sure that authorized individuals use their own accounts.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
